game.name: Rap Pop Jump Core
game.shortDescription: Rap Pop Jump Core는 끊임없는 움직임, 빠른 결정 및 전투를 요구하는 하드코어 액션 플랫폼 게임입니다. 플랫폼 간을 점프하여 생동감 넘치는 도시를 탐색하세요. 한 번의 실수로 운명에 빠지게 됩니다. 빠르게 탈출하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer demanding constant movement, quick decisions, and combat. Navigate a vibrant city by leaping between platforms. One mistake, and you fall to your fate. Escape swiftly!

reviewHighlights.text: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38888018-United-Critics/] Please follow [b]United Critics[/b] for quality reviews[/url] [h2]Rap Pop Jump C...
This game is weak even for a platformer for me, in the same colors again and again, boring monotonous though it costs a little I did not like the game...
